```{r load_data}

```

-------

```{r twitchdata}
twitchdata <- mutate(twitchdata,
                     Gain.percent = 100*Followers.gained/(Followers-Followers.gained),
                     log_Watch.time.Minutes. = log(Watch.time.Minutes.),
                     log_Followers = log(Followers),
                     log_Followers.gained = log(Followers.gained),
                     log_Stream.time.minutes. = log(Stream.time.minutes.),
                     log_Views.gained = log(Views.gained))
language_data <- count(twitchdata, Language, sort= TRUE)
```

```{r split-data}
set.seed(1234)
twitchdata_split <- initial_split(twitchdata)
twitchdata_train <- training(twitchdata_split)
twitchdata_test  <- testing(twitchdata_split)
```

## Plots and Graphs

_Stream Time to Watch Time, filtering out outliers (values that lie outside 98% of data) and considering only english streamers._
```{r StreamTime_WatchTime, echo=FALSE}
twitchdata %>%
  filter(Language == "English") %>%
 filter(Gain.percent < quantile(Gain.percent, 0.75) &
         Gain.percent > quantile(Gain.percent, 0.25)) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = log(Stream.time.minutes.), 
                       y = log(Watch.time.Minutes.))) +
                 geom_point() + 
                 labs (title = "Stream Time to Followers Gained",
                       x = "ln Stream Time (min)",
                       y = "ln Watch Time (min)") +
          geom_smooth()
```


_Considering the interquartile range of the percentage of followers gained over the past year. Again using only english streamers_
``` {r WatchTime_Followers, echo = FALSE}

  filter(Language == "English") %>%
  #filter(Watch.time.Minutes. < quantile(Watch.time.Minutes., 0.99) &

  #filter(Gain.percent < quantile(Gain.percent, 0.9) &
   #      Gain.percent > quantile(Gain.percent, 0.01)) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = log(Watch.time.Minutes.),

                 geom_point() + 
                 labs (title = "Watch Time to Followers",
```

``` {r StreamTime_PercentageGain, echo = FALSE}
twitchdata %>%
  filter(Language == "English") %>%
  #filter(Watch.time.Minutes. < quantile(Watch.time.Minutes., 0.99) &
   #      Watch.time.Minutes. > quantile(Watch.time.Minutes., 0.01)) %>%
  filter(Gain.percent < quantile(Gain.percent, 0.75) &
         Gain.percent > quantile(Gain.percent, 0.25)) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = log(Stream.time.minutes.), 
                       y = (Gain.percent))) +
                 geom_point() + 
                 labs (title = "Stream Time to Followers",
                       x = "ln Watch Time (min)",
                       y = "Followers") +
        geom_smooth()
```

```{r recipe_watchtime_followers}
twitchdata_recipe_1 <- recipe(log_Followers.gained ~ log_Watch.time.Minutes. +
                                log_Stream.time.minutes. +
                                log_Views.gained,
                      data = twitchdata)
```

```{r model_watchtime_followers}
twitchdata_spec_1 <- linear_reg() %>%
  set_engine("lm")
```

```{r workflow_watchtime_followers}
twitchdata_wflow <- workflow() %>%
  add_model(twitchdata_spec_1) %>%
  add_recipe(twitchdata_recipe_1)
```

```{r fit_watchtime_followers}
twitchdata_fit_1 <- twitchdata_wflow %>%
  fit(data = twitchdata_train)
tidy(twitchdata_fit_1)
```

```{r pred_watchtime_followers}
twitchdata_pred_1 <- predict(twitchdata_fit_1, 
                             twitchdata_test) %>%
  bind_cols(twitchdata_test)
```

```{r accuracy_watchtime_followers}
glance(twitchdata_fit_1)$adj.r.squared
```
